Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back South Australia 850967 CR Tour De Vines South Australia 8509414 CR Tour De Vines South Australia 8509458 CR Tour De Vines South Australia ABP2598 CR Tour De Vines South Australia 8509515 CR Tour De Vines South Australia ABP2617 CR Tour De Vines South Australia ABP2729 CR Tour De Vines South Australia 7 Day Guided Cycling Tour - Trails of South Australia 6 Nights • Cycling Tour • Select Meals Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions Experience the best of South Australia on this 7-day, 6-night guided cycling tour through the Barossa, Clare Valley, Adelaide Hills, and McLaren Vale. Ride the Barossa, Riesling, Amy Gillett, and Shiraz Trails at a relaxed pace, perfect for enjoying the scenery and small-group camaraderie. Savour premium food and wine experiences—from world-class Barossa reds to McLaren Vale’s coastal flavours—crafted to highlight the region’s rich culinary culture. This tour offers a personalised, intimate adventure with a local guide and support vehicle ensure a smooth, stress-free ride! View more View less 6 nights + guided cycling tour + select meals + sightseeing from $ 5269 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : Until 19 Jan 26 or unless sold out prior Your inclusions 6 Nights accommodation across Adelaide Select meals including: 6 breakfasts, 5 winery lunches with wine tastings & 4 dinners Exclusive wine making & tastings tutorial at Wirra Wirra Wines in McLaren Vale Arrival & departure transfers (start & end date of tour only) Experienced, qualified ride with guide throughout Support vehicle and driver following at all times Souvenir lightweight t-shirt, environmentally friendly with water bottle, luggage tags BYO bike or hire at an additional cost Price from From $5269 per person share twin From $5729 per solo traveller Departures: 06 Mar 26, 20 Mar 26, 10 Apr 26, 24 Apr 26 & 08 May 26 7 Day Guided Cycling Tour - Intinerary Day 1 : Arrive to Adelaide Arrive into Adelaide, transfers provided to your accommodation, meet and greet your guide with a welcome group dinner on your first night to get excited about your adventure ahead. Meals: Restaurant dinner in Adelaide (2 courses) Day 2: Travel to Barossa Transfer to the Barossa for a day of cycling, wine tasting and gourmet food sampling. Visits may include Penfolds, Maggie Beers, Yalumba and other iconic food and wine venues whilst cycling the off road Barossa Rail Trail. A fun day on the bike. Meals: Full breakfast; Platter style lunch in Barossa, 2 course dinner in Barossa. Cycling 25kms Day 3: Riesling Rail Trail Morning transfer to Auburn via iconic Seppetsfeld Road for a day of cycling on the Riesling Rail Trail to Clare. A highlight is a full gourmet lunch at the highly regarded Skillogalee Winery. Overnight in Clare. Cycling 35kms Meals: Full breakfast in Barossa, Lunch at Skillogalee. Evening free. Day 4: Adelaide Hills From Clare we make our way back to Auburn tracing a slightly different route with lots of optional diversions, and a gourmet platter style lunch at the stunning O’Leary Walker Winery. We then transfer to the beautiful Adelaide Hills and check in at our accommodation in the middle of historic Hahndorf. Cycling 35kms Meals: Full breakfast; winery lunch. Free evening. Day 5: Amy Gillet Trail Today we ride the scenic Amy Gillet Trail in the Adelaide Hills. Enjoy chocolate and wine tastings and a lovely winery lunch. An easy 25kms ride before we make our way back to Hahndorf for some free time and our 2nd night. Cycling distance: 25kms Meals: Cafe breakfast. Special dinner at Chef Hat Mount Lofty Estate restaurant Day 6: McLaren Vale After a hearty breakfast, we transfer via the scenic route to the seaside wine region of McLaren Vale. Our cycling today is on the paved, scenic and aptly named Shiraz Trail, a flat and fun ride. We enjoy an exclusive wine and food matching lunch at Wirra Wirra, before being transferred back to Adelaide for our final evening. We celebrate the tour with a restaurant dinner in Adelaide, which is always loads of fun. Overnight in Adelaide. Cycling 20-25kms Meals: Full breakfast, winery lunch, group restaurant dinner Day 7 – Adelaide and Farewell Enjoy our final breakfast and farewell fellow riders and your guide team. Onward transfers or extra nights in Adelaide can be arranged. Day 7: Adelaide Farewell Enjoy our final breakfast and farewell fellow riders and your guide team. Onward transfers or extra nights in Adelaide can be arranged. Terms & Conditions Sales until 19 Jan 26 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 04 Nov 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability. Prices are per person share twin. Full payment may be required at the time of booking, cancellation fees apply, ask your House of Travel consultant for full terms and conditions. Payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • A peak season supplement applies from 1 March to 31 May each year to cover increased accommodation costs. Additionally, a surcharge may apply for any tours booked over a long weekend or any Australian or Public Holiday including Easter. Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
